title: Plate Summary
description: A summary of a license plate analysis

quality.description: A string indicating the quality of the plate image ('readable' or 'unreadable'). This is not a super reliable property, so consider using `rating` instead.

text.description: A string representing the text of the plate

ranking.description: A number between 0 and 1 (inclusive) which indicates the quality of the text result for the plate. The higher the number, the better the quality.

rating.description: A summary that indicates the OCR quality of the text of the plate.

state.description: A string indicating the issuing state for the plate
